page.title: 15ST. MARY'S CHURCH, UNSTONE.
page.content: Parish of Dronfield. Minister in charge, Mrs.M.Parsons, Deaconess. Ecumenical;two denom. Anglican and Methodist services,one congregation. Av.att.12-25. Built 1920, combined 1978 with Crow Lane Methodist Church, whose chapel is now private house. "Many problems; difficulty meeting financial obligations. Set to raise Â£3000 p.a. Community predom. elderly. Many Soc.Sec., Sup. Benefit. Cannot ask those people to covenant. "Need for base on Unstone Green. Too far for elderly & arthritic to come to church. Events in church hall poorly attended, in open air on Green, get crowds. Written Housing Dep. for use house, shop for neighbourhood centre. "Palm Sun., process from church with donkey, borrowed Apperknowle. Open-air service on Green, distrib. palms. People watch from doors and windows."
